case_title: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. Larson et al

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1)(B)(viii) &; 18:2 NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - Possession w/intent to distribute methamphetamine(4)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT 125 months, followed by 5 years supervised release. MAF $100.00. RESTITUTION $1940.50. - REVOCATION April 23, 2015 - IMPRISONMENT 6 MONTHS with credit for time served, to be followed by a period of 12 months supervised release.
